description: Stores information related to PB Invoice Notification History.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the invoice record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STMT_NOTIF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when a MyChart/non-MyChart invoice notification was sent to the subscriber.

columns.name: STMT_NOTIF_DEST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the destination type to which the invoice notification was sent.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Email


SMS


Push

columns.name: STMT_NOTIF_DEST
columns.description: Stores the destination to which the invoice notification was sent.

columns.name: STMT_NOTIF_SETTING_ID
columns.description: Stores the pointer to the HST that indicates the type of notification that was sent.

columns.name: STMT_NOTIF_GROUP_SETTING_ID
columns.description: Stores the pointer to the parent HST record which represents the type of notification that was sent.
